showProcessedData¶

class oct.showProcessedData(data, processer, zrange=None, mask=True, thresh=120)¶

Quick and easy way to view all the processed data contrasts. :param data: Dataset object :type data: object :param processer: Post object :type processer: object :param zrange: Z range for plotting ie. [100 900] :type zrange: array :param mask: Perform masking :type mask: bool :param thresh: Mask Threshold on DOP ie. 120 :type thresh: int

Notes

Excluded frames and colormap for theta contrast is designated at the top of the method.
